name: anti_rhythm
description:
Using the section “rhythm” of the CASIO SA-35, I generated some random sounds by adding a fuzz, two delays, a reverb and a synthwah/envelope filter pedals together. Therefore,  I intended to create variations with the rhythm while also experiencing with textures as I manipulated the pedals. 

Recorded with a Casio SA-35 and some effects, using a brazilian Giannini Baguinho amplifier and captured with a shure sm57 microphone.

Second piece of the series “casio weirdo”, unusual music and noise experiments in an old Casio toy keyboard.
